alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Colquitt; Decatur; Dougherty; Grady; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole; Thomas; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 7:03PM EDT until July 15 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Eastern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Eastern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 702 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Leary to 9 miles north of Chattahoochee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Bainbridge, Cairo, Pelham, Putney, Camilla, Baconton, Doerun, Ochlocknee, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Attapulgus, Sale City, Climax, Brinson, Capel, Anderson City, Parkerville and Rocky Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Colquitt; Decatur; Dougherty; Grady; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole; Thomas; Worth
